name: Claude Code
description: Displays the current Claude Code session status, model, and token usage

properties.description: Unique identifier for the Claude session

properties.description: Total input tokens used in session

properties.description: Total output tokens used in session

properties.name: .ContextWindow.ContextWindowSize
properties.description: Maximum context window size for the model

methods.name: .TokenUsagePercent.Gauge
methods.description: Returns a visual gauge using 5-bar blocks (e.g., ‚ñ∞‚ñ∞‚ñ∞‚ñ∞‚ñ±) to show context window usage

methods.name: .TokenUsagePercent.String
methods.description: Returns the numeric percentage value as a string (e.g., '75')

methods.name: .Percent.Gauge
methods.description: Returns a visual gauge using 5-bar blocks (e.g., ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñë) to show used capacity. Available on .Premium.Percent, .Inline.Percent, and .Chat.Percent

methods.name: .Percent.String
methods.description: Returns the numeric percentage value as a string (e.g., '75'). Available on .Premium.Percent, .Inline.Percent, and .Chat.Percent

methods.name: .Remaining.Gauge
methods.description: Returns a visual gauge using 5-bar blocks (e.g., ‚ñë‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà) to show remaining capacity. Available on .Premium.Remaining, .Inline.Remaining, and .Chat.Remaining
